Text:
My first, and quite possibly my last movie release. I enjoyed this movie so much though I had to give it what it deserved. 

The English subtitles are hardsubbed and I chose the original Mandarin audio track instead of the Cantonese. 

This file should be PS3 and Xbox 360 ready, but have not tested.
